subject: Clarify preset naming across documentation
body:
Rename preset types to avoid confusion:
- Layout Presets → "Layouts" (20 grid templates)
- Style Presets → "Quick Styles" (theme + font combinations)
- Theme Presets → "Themes" (color schemes)

Added "Preset Types (Naming Clarification)" table to CLAUDE.md
Added "Quick Styles" section to README.md
Updated all references to use consistent terminology
